channel.title: D-link DIR 655, Wont save changes, and wont upgrade firmware
channel.description:
Hey guys, i used to portforward by my mom, but now i moved in by my dad and he has a D-link DIR 655 router, and everytime i try to open up a few ports and save it, it says its loading and i've to wait, and when that screen is over i have to login again. And when i login and go back the the portforward section its just back to the default.
so i tried to upgrade my firmware from 2.1 to 3.5, but when i do that it says its updated but it still is 2.1
anyone knows how to solve this?? its a A4 2.1 firmware.

item.title: D-link DIR 655, Wont save changes, and wont upgrade firmware
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk

item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Call up your service provider and ask them to reset your router or ask them to trouble shoot for you.

Read full topic
